nodes.text: The Voam was a tribe of Evocii led by Odeph in the year 3643 BBY, when tensions between the Hutts and the Evocii on Nal Hutta were high. In order to maintain peace, Odeph and his tribe allied with Suudaa Nem'ro of the Hutt Cartel and attempted to return metals stolen from the Hutts by the Evocii, but failed to talk the other tribes into turning over their metals.
